(OOC: *Giggles* Ever seen the movie Hots Shots? The spoof of Top Gun? 
I just finished watching it.. it's soooo funny, LOL!)

Teltoli sniffed the air a few times with her extremely delicate nose, 
and then srunched it up. "Swamps? You still live in the swamps?" She 
didn't whine, exactly, it was more of a statement.

Suddenly she smiled. "Do you remember that other huge raptor.. Rage, 
I think it was? Boy, I remember that really clearly. She always 
thought I was like a little kid.." She crossed her arms across her 
chest, almost in defence of herself. "Let's see how much of a kid I 
am now.." She huffed.

'Okay, so maybe I haven't grown up much. I'm still a spoiled brat.. 
but at least I learnt some more fighting techniques' She thought 
silently to herself.

Still being in robot mode, the Fuzor ran her hand along the leaves of 
some bush leaves. She eyes were wide with an almost childish delight. 
"Earth is so much more.. scenic.. than Cybertron. I mean first of all 
there's different colors, not just grey and blue of the cities. And 
there's all different types of species of animals.." Her voice was 
awed, as if coming to Earth was a whole new experiance.

The Fuzor broke out of her stunned gazing "I'm sorry, Carnage, I must 
be boring you with my babbling" She cast a apologetic look at her 
friend.
